job.title: Senior Cloud Administrator
job.description:
Peraton is seeking a Senior Cloud Administrator to provide administration support for a classified cloud environment hosting multiple government programs. This is a hands-on position which requires constant monitoring of system status, responding to user requests for provisioning user accounts, configuring virtual private clouds, and deploy cloud support services such as bastion hosts, service points of entry, and other user-specific cloud services
The candidate will be required to provide 8x5 support and be available to support high profile/escalated support requests after hours. Additional responsibilities include first-level software & network support, problem identification, system performance analysis and reporting.
Peraton drives missions of consequence spanning the globe and extending to the farthest reaches of the galaxy. As the world’s leading mission capability integrator and transformative enterprise IT provider, we deliver trusted and highly differentiated national security solutions and technologies that keep people safe and secure. Peraton serves as a valued partner to essential government agencies across the intelligence, space, cyber, defense, civilian, health, and state and local markets. Every day, our 22,000 employees do the can’t be done, solving the most daunting challenges facing our customers.
